name: thinkcontext
description: Inserts contextual, politically progressive information into your web browsing

preferences.name: opt_bechdel
preferences.title: Bechdel Movie Test
preferences.description: Indicates whether a movie passes the The Bechdel Test, that is, if a movie contains two women that at some point speak to each other about something besides a man.

preferences.name: opt_hotel
preferences.title: Enable Union Hotels
preferences.description: Using the Union Hotel Guide put out by Hotel Workers Rising this feature will show you which hotels have union workers and which are involved involved in a labor dispute.

preferences.name: opt_green
preferences.title: Enable Green Pages
preferences.description: Information on green businesses as listed in The Green Pages.

preferences.name: opt_rush
preferences.title: Enable Rush Advertisers
preferences.description: Data on Rush Limbaugh advertisers from stoprush.net

preferences.name: opt_bcorp
preferences.title: B Corps
preferences.description: B Corps are certified to meet rigorous standards of social and environmental performance, accountability, and transparency.
